titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Oversize Ms. Codex 882: Statuta et ordinamenta communis et hominum Montis Dolii

notesStmt.note: Incipit (statutes): In nomine individue trinitatis amen. Cum institia sit iuxta dictum tullii fundamentum perpetue commendationis ... (f. 3r)
Explicit (statutes): ... hanc formam redegi et ideo me ad fidem [?] et signum meum apposui consuetum (f. 47r).
Statutes written by Stefanus, whose name appears on leaf 47r.
Table of contents added later (f. 1r-2v), now extremely faded.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: 84 chapters of statutes concerning civil and criminal law followed by later notarial documents and other records, all associated with the Tuscan municipality of Mons Dolius, or Montedoglio.

msItem.title: Statuta et ordinamenta communis et hominum Montis Dolii

supportDesc.extent: 76 leaves : 284 x 204 (172 x 126) mm. bound to 296 x 221 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, 76; 1-76; contemporary foliation in ink, upper right recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in various scripts by several hands.

decoDesc.decoNote: Chapter titles in red and initials in blue (f. 3r-46r).
